LockedDisplay.source_clue: The Item displayed in the Hall had been given to Mr. Boddy by his uncle.

ContainerAccessGate.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.

ItemUnavailableDueToRepair.source_clue: Unfortunately the pocket watch was damaged during Mr. Boddy's vacation and was being fixed by a local repair shop. It was never in the mansion yesterday; it was returned this morning.

GroupExcursionWindow.source_clue: After the night time ball, Professor Plum, Colonel Mustard, Mrs. Peacock, and Mr. Green went outside to stargaze. Professor Plum is an avid astronomer and was asked to explain what the different constellations were.

BeforeMeetingConstraint.source_clue: I'm sure that the thief stole the Item just before meeting with Mr. Boddy.

DiscoveryTimeUpperBound.source_clue: He discovered the theft before sundown...

OneEventAllDay.source_clue: It was to be an all-day music event with a quartet and then the ball at night.

MultipleBlackouts.source_clue: The lights went out three times after lunch, but not before.

AfterMidnightWindow.source_clue: It was just before midnight when Mr. Boddy went up for the night; the guests followed his lead and retired at the same time.

ShortVisitGuest.source_clue: The thief did not stay for more than a few hours.

SequentialPrivateMeetings.source_clue: Miss Scarlet met with Mr. Boddy in the Early Afternoon, while Professor Plum met with him at Dusk.

PreEventWindow.source_clue: The guests didn't put on their costumes until after breakfast; they headed upstairs to change.
PreEventWindow.template: Guests did not prepare for the occasion until after {time}.

EarlyMorningTheft.source_clue: The smell of bacon brought all the men to the Kitchen at Dawn.

ArgumentBetweenGuests.source_clue: There was a little spat over breakfast; apparently one guest did not appreciate hearing details of the last hunt.
ArgumentBetweenGuests.template: A disagreement flared at {time}; one guest took offence to talk of the earlier affair.

SomeoneBeingStoodUp.source_clue: Lady Lavender is in a foul mood as she was stood up from some appointment she had made.
SomeoneBeingStoodUp.template: {suspect} was displeased after being left waiting for an arranged meeting.

SomeoneInAFoulMood.source_clue: After his last appointment, I was surprised to find Mr. Boddy in a foul mood; he sent the guests home and dismissed the staff.
SomeoneInAFoulMood.template: After their final appointment, Mr. Boddy’s temper was noticeably sour.

BraggingContest.source_clue: For weeks Prince Azure has been going on and on about how good he is at billiards...
BraggingContest.template: {suspect} would not stop boasting about a pastime.

SomeoneAvoidingSomeone.source_clue: Mr. Green seemed angry with everyone and stayed as far away from Professor Plum as possible.
SomeoneAvoidingSomeone.template: {suspect1} kept their distance from {suspect2}, plainly annoyed.

SomeoneFollowingSomeone.source_clue: I overheard Mrs. Peacock ask if anyone would play chess with her at night before bed; one person eventually relented.
SomeoneFollowingSomeone.template: I heard {suspect} asking for company for a game before bed.

GroupSplitsIntoCliques.source_clue: After tea, all the men decided to play poker in the lounge and kept at it until very late.
GroupSplitsIntoCliques.template: After {time}, the party broke into separate clusters rather than one gathering.

SomeoneLeavesEarly.source_clue: Mr. Green and Mrs. Peacock left during dinner even before dessert was served.
SomeoneLeavesEarly.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} departed during {time}, well before the affair ended. {suspect} was named in connection.

SomeoneArrivesLate.source_clue: Professor Plum arrived just in time for lunch and stayed for dinner as well; he apologized for being late.
SomeoneArrivesLate.template: {suspect} turned up barely in time for {time}, apologizing for the delay.

TwoPeopleAlwaysTogether.source_clue: Colonel Mustard and Mrs. Peacock always had candles with them but were never in the same room together.
TwoPeopleAlwaysTogether.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} kept to the same rooms throughout.

OnePersonKeepsToThemselves.source_clue: Professor Plum spent all day in the west wing muttering to himself and clearly agitated.
OnePersonKeepsToThemselves.template: {suspect} stayed mostly in the {location}, keeping to themselves and visibly unsettled.

Jealousy.source_clue: Mrs. Peacock and her daughter were clearly upset with Colonel Mustard and stayed as far away from him as possible.
Jealousy.template: {suspect1} was plainly displeased with {suspect2} and avoided them entirely.

Embarrassment.source_clue: Prince Azure was slightly embarrassed to find that he had arrived before any of the other guests and had to eat his Lunch alone.
Embarrassment.template: {suspect} arrived early and ate {time} alone, clearly embarrassed.

ActivitySaturation.source_clue: It's always so hectic when we have a party; I have to make sure to put out enough towels and get all of the guests their food as they lounge about outside.
ActivitySaturation.template: These parties are a bustle; I must keep refreshments moving for everyone.

RoomsClosedOff.source_clue: The study and billiard room were being cleaned from before dawn until dinner and were off-limits to the guests.
RoomsClosedOff.template: The {location1} and {location2} were shut to guests from {time1} until {time2} for cleaning.

StaffCleaningRotation.source_clue: The study and billiard room were being cleaned from before dawn until dinner and were off-limits to the guests.
StaffCleaningRotation.template: The staff cycled through rooms for cleaning between {time1} and {time2}, so some areas were closed.

CertainWingsEmpty.source_clue: No one was in the North wing during the event.

EveryoneOutside.source_clue: During tea time all guests were sitting around the rose garden, sunning themselves.
EveryoneOutside.template: At {time}, everyone was out at the {location}, enjoying the air.

EveryoneIndoors.source_clue: It's come to my attention that all of Mr. Boddy's items were indoors all day.
EveryoneIndoors.template: All of Mr. Boddy’s possessions remained indoors for the day.

OneRoomOffLimits.source_clue: No one was allowed in the kitchen during the party since Mrs. White was busy preparing meals and didn't want to be disturbed.
OneRoomOffLimits.template: The {location} was kept off-limits while {suspect} was occupied with arrangements.

SecretPassagesOpen.source_clue: It's come to my attention that the secret passages are locked... remove the padlocks from the board; you may travel freely through the secret passages now.
SecretPassagesOpen.template: The passageways were left unbarred and could be used freely.

SecretPassagesClosed.source_clue: I'm afraid I'm going to have to ask the butler to close the secret passages... place the padlocks on the secret passages for the rest of the game.
SecretPassagesClosed.template: I had the passageways sealed from {time} onward.

ItemsLockedAway.source_clue: Mr. Boddy immediately locked both these items up just to get them to be quiet.
ItemsLockedAway.template: Mr. Boddy had the items put under lock and key to quiet the matter.

ItemsOnDisplay.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.
ItemsOnDisplay.template: The valuables were displayed openly in their cases for all to see. It was in the {location}. This was by {time}. {suspect} was named in connection.

ItemsLentOut.source_clue: The guests thought it would be clever to borrow items from Mr. Boddy to complete their costumes... Mr. Boddy agreed and lent out quite a few of his valuable items.
ItemsLentOut.template: Mr. Boddy allowed guests to borrow several valuables for the occasion.

TheEarlyArriver.source_clue: Prince Azure was slightly embarrassed to find that he had arrived before any of the other guests and had to eat his Lunch alone.
TheEarlyArriver.template: {suspect} arrived ahead of the others and took {time} alone.

TheLateLeaver.source_clue: Mrs. Meadowbrook came by just as tea was being served... Mrs. Meadowbrook was also the last guest to leave.

TheShortStayGuest.source_clue: The thief did not stay for more than a few hours.

TheOneWhoIsUpset.source_clue: Lady Lavender is in a foul mood as she was stood up from some appointment she had made.

TheOneWhoIsBoastful.source_clue: For weeks Prince Azure has been going on and on about how good he is at Billiards...

TheOneWhoIsNervous.source_clue: The guests were scared of the dark; they tried to stay with people who had candles...

TheOneWhoIsDistracted.source_clue: The thief was too distracted to play any games.

TheOneWhoIsHelpful.source_clue: Rusty was assigned to help Mrs. White with the meals...

TheOneWhoIsEavesdropping.source_clue: I've just learned something important: Mr. Boddy was meeting with guests yesterday to go over private issues concerning his impending inheritance. He met with them one by one outside at the fountain.
TheOneWhoIsEavesdropping.template: {suspect} lingered near Mr. Boddy’s meetings, listening in.

NonParticipant.source_clue: Prince Azure refused to wear a costume; he said it was beneath him.

ItemLentOut.source_clue: The guests thought it clever to borrow items from Mr. Boddy to complete their costumes; he agreed and lent out valuable items.

ItemOnDisplay.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.
ItemOnDisplay.template: The valuables sat in their cases for guests to admire, with the key kept in the {location}. This was by {time}. {suspect} was named in connection.

ItemBeingUsed.template: Mr. Boddy made use of the {item} in the {location} and returned it to its case afterward.

ItemBeingPolished.source_clue: Mr. Boddy asked me to polish some of his items--namely the letter opener, crystal paperweight, and the pocket watch--as the guests were eating dinner.
ItemBeingPolished.template: Mr. Boddy asked me to shine the {item1}, {item2}, and the {item3}.

ItemBeingRepaired.source_clue: Unfortunately the pocket watch was damaged during Mr. Boddy's vacation and was being fixed by a local repair shop. It was never in the mansion yesterday; it was returned this morning.

ItemMentionedButSafe.source_clue: Professor Plum recalls seeing all of the Antiques during the time he was alone.

ItemNeverMentioned.source_clue: Mr. Boddy had his Jewelry locked up all day.

ItemMovedButReturned.source_clue: After dinner I entered the study and noticed someone had used the letter opener and spy glass... I put them back on the shelf.

ItemMisplaced.source_clue: Mr. Boddy wanted to take care of some financial affairs but part of his Desk Set was missing.

ItemInWrongRoom.source_clue: This morning I found Mr. Boddy's expensive spy glass in the secret passage; it had been damaged with a large dent.

InstrumentalTheft.source_clue: Mrs. Meadowbrook stole the revolver to stop the hunt from happening.

UtilityDrivenTarget.source_clue: She thought her only way out was to steal the revolver and stop the hunt from happening.

CostumePropItem.source_clue: Mr. Green went in costume as a Decorated Soldier. Miss Scarlet went as an Armed Burglar.
CostumePropItem.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} stood out among the guests.

TemporaryCustody.source_clue: I had complimented Lady Lavender on the jewelry on her jacket when she arrived. She told me Mr. Boddy had let her borrow it for the weekend.
TemporaryCustody.template: {suspect} told me Mr. Boddy had allowed their to borrow the {item} for the weekend.

ItemSubstituted.source_clue: Plum was found unconscious, and the spyglass was found in the secret passage with him... but it was the brooch that had been taken.

ItemRecoveredFromWrongPerson.source_clue: Plum was found unconscious and the spyglass was found with him.

WearableValuable.source_clue: I had complimented Lady Lavender on the jewelry on her jacket when she arrived. She told me Mr. Boddy had let her borrow it for the weekend.

SociallyDisplayedItem.source_clue: The guests that arrived with Lady Lavender seemed especially impressed by the jewelry--almost overly interested.

SeenEnteringRoom.source_clue: Mr. Boddy did have breakfast with Mr. Green; Mr. Boddy asked that I bring his morning paper while they dined. Lady Lavender showed up just as the meal finished and just had tea.

SeenLeavingRoom.source_clue: Mr. Green and Mrs. Peacock left during dinner even before dessert was served.
SeenLeavingRoom.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} slipped out during {time}, before the end. {suspect} was named in connection.

ShadowThroughWindow.source_clue: After lunch I was looking out from the ballroom window when I saw a shadow move in a nearby room; it was probably just the cat.
ShadowThroughWindow.template: From the {location} after {time}, I noticed a shadow shift in a nearby room.

SomeoneHeardButNotSeen.source_clue: As I went to summon the gentlemen for lunch I heard someone speaking very softly; it was only Mr. Boddy reading a passage from an old book to his guests.
SomeoneHeardButNotSeen.template: When I went to summon the guests for {time}, I heard soft voices but saw no one.

SomeoneSeenLurking.source_clue: As Mrs. White prepared for dinner she noted that someone was lurking about in the west wing; it distressed her awfully.
SomeoneSeenLurking.template: {suspect} remarked on someone lingering in the {location}, which unsettled their.

SomeoneSeenWithItem.source_clue: I overheard the violinist saying he saw Miss Scarlet when she was last on stage; he even asked her for an autograph.
SomeoneSeenWithItem.template: A visitor reported seeing {suspect} and approached them in passing.

SomeoneSeenNearLocation.source_clue: Colonel Mustard told me he saw someone lurking around in one of the north rooms today, acting suspiciously.

TwoPeopleSeenTogether.source_clue: Mrs. Peacock was with Professor Plum in the early afternoon; Plum was explaining theories on ancient Egypt, no doubt.
TwoPeopleSeenTogether.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} were together in the {time}, deep in conversation.

SomeoneAlwaysInPublicRooms.source_clue: After tea, all the men decided to play poker in the lounge and kept at it until very late.

SomeoneNeverInPublicRooms.source_clue: No one was in the North wing during the event.

SomeoneOnlySeenOnce.source_clue: Prince Azure stopped by during lunch, hoping to talk to Lady Lavender, but was too late; he grabbed an apple and left.
SomeoneOnlySeenOnce.template: {suspect} appeared briefly at {time}, stayed only a moment, and departed.

EmotionalExit.source_clue: It's not my place to judge, but the men ate like pigs at breakfast; Mrs. Meadowbrook asked only for fruit juice before excusing herself and suddenly leaving.
EmotionalExit.template: {suspect} stayed only briefly, then excused themself and left at once. This was by {time}.

UnidentifiableRunner.source_clue: As I was retiring I saw someone running through the corridors; he or she was in costume and I have no idea who it was.
UnidentifiableRunner.template: As I retired, an unidentifiable runner dashed through the corridors in poor light.

MaskedFigureSeen.source_clue: As I was retiring I saw someone running through the corridors; he or she was in costume and I have no idea who it was.

DisguisedMovement.source_clue: The guests thought it clever to borrow items from Mr. Boddy to complete their costumes; he agreed and lent out valuable items.

SharedTimeBlock.source_clue: The suspects were all together for Breakfast and Dinner, but Lunch was informal and people came and went as they pleased.

ExclusiveTimeWindow.source_clue: The last time the lights went out was midnight, but by this point everyone but Miss Scarlet had gone to bed.

RoomCategoryExclusion.source_clue: The theft did not occur in a Location that a game was played at.

ItemCategoryExclusion.source_clue: Mr. Boddy bought his Desk Items in London.
ItemCategoryExclusion.template: Mr. Boddy obtained a group of valuables together; those can be ruled out.

BehavioralOutlier.source_clue: It's not my place to judge, but the men ate like pigs at breakfast; Mrs. Meadowbrook asked only for fruit juice before excusing herself and suddenly leaving.
BehavioralOutlier.template: {suspect} partook only briefly, then excused themselves and left abruptly. This was by {time}.

InventoryAccounting.source_clue: Mr. Boddy wanted to take care of some financial affairs but part of his Desk Set was missing.
InventoryAccounting.template: Mr. Boddy checked their collection and found a piece missing.

ObjectElimination.source_clue: The pocket watch was being repaired and was not in the mansion yesterday.
ObjectElimination.template: The {item} was away for repair and could not have been taken.

SurvivorByElimination.source_clue: You could eliminate the medal, the pocket watch, all of the desk items, and the revolver...

ContradictoryTestimony.source_clue: Colonel Mustard told me he saw someone lurking around in one of the north rooms today, acting suspiciously.
ContradictoryTestimony.template: {suspect} claimed to see someone in the {location}, but that area was empty.

Misinterpretation.source_clue: Mrs. White is quite upset. She says she overheard someone saying that he wants Mr. Boddy's new rare cook and is afraid she's being replaced.
Misinterpretation.template: A remark was misheard, which later proved misleading.

SequenceReconstruction.source_clue: Miss Scarlet met with Mr. Boddy in the Early Afternoon, while Professor Plum met with him at Dusk.
SequenceReconstruction.template: {suspect1} met Mr. Boddy in the {time}, while {suspect2} saw them at {time2}. {suspect} was named in connection.

DurationConstraint.source_clue: The thief did not stay for more than a few hours.
DurationConstraint.template: One guest remained only a short while—no more than a few hours.

PresenceConstraint.source_clue: One of you was with the thief today.
PresenceConstraint.template: One of you was in the company of the person in question at some point today.

AbsenceConstraint.source_clue: No one was in the North wing during the event.
AbsenceConstraint.template: No one was in the {location} during the event.

AudioOnlyEvent.source_clue: Mr. Green said he heard the sound of breaking glass as he was rushing to Breakfast. He was afraid of missing the meal so he didn't stop to check it out.
AudioOnlyEvent.template: {suspect} heard breaking glass while hurrying to {time}.

UnverifiedDisturbance.source_clue: After lunch I was looking out from the ballroom window when I saw a shadow move in a nearby room; it was probably just the cat.
UnverifiedDisturbance.template: I noticed a shadow in a nearby room; it may have been only the cat.

RoleItemMapping.source_clue: Mr. Green went in costume as a Decorated Soldier. Miss Scarlet went as an Armed Burglar.
RoleItemMapping.template: {suspect1} and {suspect2} chose distinctive looks for the occasion.

CostumeImpliesItem.source_clue: Colonel Mustard went in costume as an old Sea Captain. Mrs. Meadow-Brook went as a Librarian.
CostumeImpliesItem.template: The manner and bearing of {suspect1} and {suspect2} hinted at their interests.

AfterMeetingConstraint.source_clue: The thief arrived after the book reading.
AfterMeetingConstraint.template: The incident occurred after a private engagement.

RelativeEventTiming.source_clue: The party didn't start until after lunch.
RelativeEventTiming.template: The gathering did not begin until after {time}.

ScheduleIntersection.source_clue: The men were tied up playing poker from teatime until midnight.
ScheduleIntersection.template: A group was occupied with an activity from {time1} until {time2}.

DerivedTimeWindow.source_clue: If the theft happened after teatime it had to be a woman who did it.
DerivedTimeWindow.template: If the theft happened after {time}, it could only have been a smaller subset of guests.

ProximityOpportunity.source_clue: The guests that arrived with Lady Lavender seemed especially impressed by the jewelry--almost overly interested.

NearestSuspectWindow.source_clue: When Lavender left her jacket, Mustard seized the opportunity.

ItemOriginFilter.source_clue: The Item displayed in the Hall had been given to Mr. Boddy by his uncle.
ItemOriginFilter.template: The {item} in the {location} was a personal gift to Mr. Boddy.

LatestPossibleTime.source_clue: He discovered the theft before sundown.

AccessTrail.source_clue: There is a trail of footprints in the snow from a kitchen window to here.
AccessTrail.template: Footprints led from the {location} to here.

KeyMovementInference.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.
KeyMovementInference.template: The key for the display cases was missing from its hook in the {location} by {time}. {suspect} was named in connection.

Greed.source_clue: The guests that arrived with Lady Lavender seemed especially impressed by the jewelry--almost overly interested.
Greed.template: The guests seemed especially impressed by the {item}, lingering over it with interest.

Impulse.source_clue: Such a criminal impulse — Scarlet used the spyglass to eavesdrop and then nicked it on the spot.
Impulse.template: Such a criminal impulse—{suspect} used the {item} and then nicked it on the spot.

Curiosity.source_clue: Miss Scarlet had picked up some limited lip-reading skills and used the spyglass to look in on the meeting.
Curiosity.template: {suspect} had picked up some lip-reading skills and used the {item} to look in on the meeting.

Revenge.source_clue: There was a little spat over breakfast; apparently one guest did not appreciate hearing details of the last hunt.
Revenge.template: There was a little spat over {time}; one guest did not appreciate the remarks.

PreventAnEvent.source_clue: She thought her only way out was to steal the revolver and stop the hunt from happening.
PreventAnEvent.template: {suspect} thought the only way out was to steal the {item} and stop the event from happening.

FearDrivenTheft.source_clue: Poor Mrs. White was terrified by the storm... driven by her fears to steal the revolver for protection.
FearDrivenTheft.template: {suspect} was terrified by the unsettling events, driven by fear to steal the {item} for protection.

ProtectiveTheft.source_clue: Mrs. White was afraid of what Mr. Boddy would say when she told him she dropped his crystal paperweight on his medal...
ProtectiveTheft.template: {suspect} was afraid of what Mr. Boddy would say and tried to conceal the mishap by taking the {item}.

CoverUp.source_clue: Someone tried to pick the lock on the study... then caused a terrible mess in the dining room as a distraction.
CoverUp.template: Someone tried to pick the lock on the {location}, then caused a terrible mess in the {location2} as a distraction.

Desperation.source_clue: Professor Plum was so desperate he stole the letter opener to try to pick the study door's lock.
Desperation.template: {suspect} was so desperate they stole the {item} to try to pick the {location} door's lock.

InformationShock.source_clue: Whatever was said in the meeting upset Scarlet so much she nicked the spyglass there and then.
InformationShock.template: Whatever was said in the meeting upset {suspect} so much they nicked the {item} there and then.

EmotionalReactionTheft.source_clue: Mrs. Meadowbrook became so upset listening to the men discuss the hunt that she stole the revolver.
EmotionalReactionTheft.template: {suspect} became so upset listening to the discussion that they stole the {item}.

ImpulsiveAfterRevelation.source_clue: Such a criminal impulse — Scarlet had just learned something and stole the spyglass immediately.
ImpulsiveAfterRevelation.template: Such a criminal impulse—{suspect} had just learned something and stole the {item} immediately.

GeneralInventoryCheck.source_clue: I can assure you all of Mr. Boddy's belongings were accounted for by late morning; I always take an inventory.
GeneralInventoryCheck.template: I can confirm all of Mr. Boddy’s belongings were accounted for by {time}.

FunctionalSetMissingItem.source_clue: Mr. Boddy wanted to take care of some financial affairs but part of his Desk Set was missing.
FunctionalSetMissingItem.template: Mr. Boddy wished to use a set, but a piece was missing.

KitCompletionCheck.source_clue: As I prepared Mr. Boddy's hunting kit, I found the spy glass and pocket watch, but I could not find the last item I needed to complete his outfit.
KitCompletionCheck.template: While preparing Mr. Boddy’s things, I found the {item1} and {item2} but could not locate the final piece.

ItemReturnedLater.source_clue: Unfortunately the pocket watch was damaged during Mr. Boddy's vacation and was being fixed by a local repair shop. It was never in the mansion yesterday; it was returned this morning.
ItemReturnedLater.template: The {item} was not in the house earlier; it was returned by {time}.

ItemMovedBetweenRooms.source_clue: Someone had used the letter opener and spy glass because they were not in their usual place; I put them back on the shelf.
ItemMovedBetweenRooms.template: Someone had used the {item1} and {item2}; I found them out of place and put them back.

ItemUnderRepair.source_clue: Unfortunately the pocket watch was damaged during Mr. Boddy's vacation and was being fixed by a local repair shop. It was never in the mansion yesterday; it was returned this morning.
ItemUnderRepair.template: The {item} was away at a repair shop after being damaged on Mr. Boddy’s trip.

BrokenObjectIndicator.source_clue: Mrs. White told me something rather interesting: she was cleaning some room in the north wing yesterday afternoon and found broken glass.
BrokenObjectIndicator.template: {suspect} mentioned broken glass found while cleaning the {location}.

PhysicalDisturbanceTrace.source_clue: After dinner I entered the study and noticed that someone had used the letter opener and spy glass because they were not in their usual place.
PhysicalDisturbanceTrace.template: After {time}, I entered the {location} and noticed the {item1} and {item2} displaced.

Footprints.source_clue: There is a trail of footprints in the snow from a kitchen window to here...
Footprints.template: There were signs of movement leading from the {location}.

WaterStains.source_clue: I found this clue that might lead to the location of the crime: the paper is water-stained, but the name of the room ends in the letter Y.
WaterStains.template: The paper clue showed signs of damage.

DamagedContainer.source_clue: Mrs. White told me that the key that opens the cases in which all the valuables were displayed was missing from its hook in the kitchen by the time she served breakfast.
DamagedContainer.template: The display case showed signs of tampering, as if pried or forced. It was in the {location}. This was by {time}. {suspect} was named in connection.

ForcedLock.source_clue: Strangely the door to the secret passage has been forced open from the inside... rather violently in fact.
ForcedLock.template: The {location} door bore signs of being forced open from within.

MisplacedDebris.source_clue: Professor Plum spilt soup in his lap...
MisplacedDebris.template: {suspect} spilt soup and left a notable mess.

BluntForceDamage.source_clue: This morning I found Mr. Boddy's expensive spy glass in the secret passage; it had been damaged with a large dent in the metal on one end.
BluntForceDamage.template: Mr. Boddy’s {item} bore a heavy dent at one end.

StruggleEvidence.source_clue: Poor misguided Professor Plum... he had gone missing... then the spy glass was found dented in the secret passage.
StruggleEvidence.template: There were signs of a disturbance, and later the {item} was found dented in the {location}.

EventWithRules.source_clue: The musicians stored their instruments in the conservatory and rested there during their breaks; guests were asked not to use the room.
EventWithRules.template: A room was reserved for staff equipment, and guests were asked not to enter the {location}.

EventThatReassignsObjects.source_clue: The guests thought it clever to borrow items from Mr. Boddy to complete their costumes; he agreed and lent out valuable items.
EventThatReassignsObjects.template: Guests borrowed items from Mr. Boddy for the occasion, with their consent.

EventThatHidesIdentity.source_clue: As I was retiring I saw someone running through the corridors; he or she was in costume and I have no idea who it was.
EventThatHidesIdentity.template: A figure moved through the corridors, identity unclear.

EventThatMovesEveryone.source_clue: During tea time all guests were sitting around the rose garden, sunning themselves.
EventThatMovesEveryone.template: After {time}, all guests gathered at the {location} together.

EventThatSplitsGroup.source_clue: After the night time ball, Professor Plum, Colonel Mustard, Mrs. Peacock, and Mr. Green went outside to stargaze. Professor Plum is an avid astronomer and was asked to explain what the different constellations were.
EventThatSplitsGroup.template: After {time}, {suspect1}, {suspect2}, {suspect3}, and {suspect4} went outside together. {suspect} was named in connection.

EventThatLocksRooms.source_clue: No one was allowed in the kitchen during the party since Mrs. White was busy preparing meals and didn't want to be disturbed.

EventThatCreatesDistraction.source_clue: Plum had to cause a distraction and what a mess he made of the dining room...
EventThatCreatesDistraction.template: {suspect} created a distraction and left the {location} in a mess.

EventThatCreatesVictim.source_clue: Most disturbing of all: the good Professor Plum has gone missing.

EventThatForcesSchedule.source_clue: I've just learned something important: Mr. Boddy was meeting with guests yesterday to go over private issues concerning his impending inheritance. He met with them one by one outside at the fountain.
EventThatForcesSchedule.template: Mr. Boddy met guests one by one outside at the {location}.

EventThatCreatesCrowds.source_clue: Dinner was a very informal affair with no assigned seats, but I do remember that everybody was present.
EventThatCreatesCrowds.template: {time} was informal, yet everyone was present.

EventThatCreatesIsolation.source_clue: Prince Azure was slightly embarrassed to find that he had arrived before any of the other guests and had to eat his Lunch alone.

EavesdroppingEvent.source_clue: Scarlet used the spyglass to look in on the meeting.

HubLocation.source_clue: During meal times all guests gathered in the dining room to play charades; some complained when Mr. Boddy stumped them with The Great Gatsby.

InformalSocialMixing.source_clue: The suspects were all together for Breakfast and Dinner, but Lunch was informal and people came and went as they pleased.
